text: On Sunday 13 April 2025, I had the chicken rice with braised egg and tofu for my lunch at the Kopitiam food court at FairPrice Hub in Joo Koon, and I liked this meal as the chicken rice with braised egg and tofu tasted very delicious. Overall, the service provided to me was very good and I would love to try these other chicken dishes from the other Fu Wei Chicken Rice outlets in the future.
